items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-driven system that suggests relevant products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users
Recommendations update in real-time based on user interactions
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing
System supports personalized recommendations for both desktop and mobile views
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data
non_functional: System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent users
Ensure GDPR compliance for user data processing

notes: Assumed that the platform already has user accounts and a product catalog. No details provided on the AI model type or data sources, so assumptions were made about using browsing and purchase history.
